content.heroIntro:
Welcome to EDIFICIO RODAS PLAYA, an exceptional residential development by CBH HOMES located in the coveted Playa de El Cura district of Torrevieja, Alicante. This thoughtfully designed collection of 2-bedroom apartments, penthouses, and bungalows offers the perfect blend of modern comfort and coastal living, with prices starting from just €265,000. Scheduled for completion on 01-03-2027, EDIFICIO RODAS PLAYA represents an outstanding investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamic and expat-friendly coastal regions.

Situated in Torrevieja's most desirable beachfront neighbourhood, this development combines proximity to pristine Blue Flag beaches with access to world-class amenities including the 24-hour Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja, international schools, and exceptional shopping facilities. Each property features contemporary finishes, air conditioning pre-installation, fitted kitchens with appliances, and private parking, ensuring residents enjoy a lifestyle of convenience and elegance.

Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean holiday home, a rental investment, or a permanent residence in Europe's largest expat community, EDIFICIO RODAS PLAYA delivers exceptional value. With property prices in Torrevieja 45% lower than Costa Blanca North and annual appreciation of 8%, now is the ideal time to invest in this thriving coastal destination where English is widely spoken and international communities flourish.

locationSection.intro: Playa de El Cura is Torrevieja's crown jewel, renowned as one of the Costa Blanca's most prestigious residential areas. This charming neighbourhood sits directly adjacent to the iconic Playa del Cura, a pristine Blue Flag beach renowned for crystal-clear waters and golden sands. The area perfectly balances beachfront tranquility with urban convenience, offering residents direct access to Mediterranean beauty whilst maintaining proximity to comprehensive services and amenities. Torrevieja itself has transformed into Spain's largest expat community, with English widely spoken throughout shops, restaurants, and healthcare facilities. The neighbourhood attracts discerning buyers from across Europe who appreciate the region's reliable sunshine, safe streets, excellent healthcare, and vibrant international community. Playa de El Cura specifically offers a sophisticated lifestyle where modern development meets natural beauty, making it ideal for those seeking both investment potential and quality-of-life benefits.
